fxmod.options.title: FauxMod Options
fxmod.options.keybind.name: Open FXMod Settings
fxmod.options.mod_default.button.tooltip: §cWARNING!§f This will reset all options to their default values.§r
fxmod.mod.fullbright.name: Fullbright
fxmod.mod.fullbright.tooltip: Removes the concept of darkness from your world.
fxmod.mod.beeesp.name: Bee ESP
fxmod.mod.beeesp.tooltip: Highlights beehives within a 30 block radius
fxmod.mod.nopotionparticles.name: No Potion Particles
fxmod.mod.nopotionparticles.tooltip: Hides the stupid potion particles from your camera
fxmod.mod.fpsdisplay.name: Show FPS
fxmod.mod.fpsdisplay.tooltip: Shows your FPS in the upper left
fxmod.mod.spawneresp.name: Spawner ESP
fxmod.mod.spawneresptags.name: Spawner Tags
fxmod.mod.spawneresptags.tooltip: Adds a nametag to show the type of spawner
fxmod.mod.nofog.name: No Fog
fxmod.mod.nofog.tooltip: Disables rendering of just about all fogs
fxmod.mod.lowfire.name: Low Fire
fxmod.mod.lowfire.tooltip: Lowers the fire overlay so it's not annoying
fxmod.mod.pingdisplay.name: Better Ping
fxmod.mod.pingdisplay.tooltip: Shows the ping in MS rather than the little bars
fxmod.mod.techno.name: Techno Pig
fxmod.mod.techno.tooltip: Places the crown of the greatest pig on the head of any pig bearing the name
fxmod.mod.toolwarning.name: Tool Warning
fxmod.mod.toolwarning.tooltip: When your tool gets close to breaking, a message will appear.
fxmod.mod.notoolbreak.name: No Tool Breaking
fxmod.mod.notoolbreak.tooltip: Stops you from using a tool once it hits 2 durability (overriden by keybind)
fxmod.mod.preciseblockplace.name: Precise Block Placment
fxmod.mod.preciseblockplace.tooltip: Makes block placing more accurate at high speeds
fxmod.mod.freecam.name: Freecam
fxmod.mod.freecam.tooltip:
Allows you to fly around like you're in spectator mode
Use the scroll wheel to adjust the speed
fxmod.mod.freecamoutline.name: Freecam Outline
fxmod.mod.freecamoutline.tooltip: Highlights your player while in freecam
fxmod.mod.step.name: Step
fxmod.mod.step.tooltip:
Allows you to step up full blocks without jumping.
§cWARNING: Won't work on most servers, could get you banned
fxmod.mod.betterzoom.name: Zoom
fxmod.mod.beeinfo.name: Bee Info
fxmod.mod.beeinfo.tooltip: Shows honey level and bee count in tooltip
fxmod.mod.clearchat.name: Chat History
fxmod.mod.clearchat.tooltip:
Disables clearing chat history when you get DC'd from a server.
F3+D will still clear chat
fxmod.mod.betterhurtcam.name: Better Hurt Cam
fxmod.mod.betterhurtcam.tooltip:
Removes the tilt when you get hit.
If you just want to lower the tilt amount, its in settings
fxmod.mod.noheartblink.name: No Heart Blink
fxmod.mod.noheartblink.tooltip: Disables blinking your hearts when you get hit. Easier to see health in pvp.
fxmod.mod.toolwarning.popup.mainhand: Main hand tool has %d durability left
fxmod.mod.beeinfo.tooltip.name: §7- %s
